Mercado Libre is LATAM's largest ecommerce & fintech business. They're also the 3rd largest digital advertising platform across the region, and offer MELI+, which is a lot like Amazon Prime.

MELI is seeing accelerated growth at scale, and reported 39% revenue growth in Q3. This is on $26B of TTM revenue. It's also reported 27 consecutive quarters of 30%+ revenue growth - the only business in the entire market to achieve this.

MELI has one of the most powerful flywheels I've ever seen. The fintech business offers credit to consumers and businesses, which accelerates the growth of its ecommerce business.

As more people join its fintech and credit business, it gets more data, which improves its credit underwriting and digital ads ROI.

This is why the business has been able to maintain 30%+ growth rates, and continues to accelerate at scale.
